Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman marked his return to the side with a belligerent knock of 81 runs
Pakistan’s pace bowlers combined to take eight wickets as Bangladesh were dismissed for 204 runs in 45.1 overs
Mahmudullah (56) managed a half-century for Bangladesh
Miscellaneous Highlights: The defeat, Bangladesh’s sixth, has ended Shakib al-Hasan’s team’s hopes of qualifying for the semifinals. Bangladesh have only won one match in the tournament
Pakistan have now won three matches from their seven and still have a mathematical chance of qualifying
Others: Electing to bat, Bangladesh could never really recover from a top order collapse as Pakistan’s three-pronged pace attack impressed with the new ball and were equally effective in the death overs
